name: luna's o2 deprive
description:
You are stuck on a moon that is slowly losing oxygen, and you need to fix the oxygen generator to survive.

This game has source code. with "copyleft"(AGPL-3.0 license) licenses. link here https://github.com/baiango/Erin-1/releases/tag/release

and this game is planned to get its remake version. This game doesn't had the winning screen.
